name: Open Meteo
description: Open-source weather API with free access for non-commercial use. No API key required. Global high-resolution weather forecasts
notes: Completely free for non-commercial. ECMWF-based models

name: Pollinations AI API
description: Open-source platform providing free text and image generation APIs without sign-ups, API keys or rate limits
notes: Completely free. Privacy focused. No keys needed

name: Dragon Ball API
description: Comprehensive information about Dragon Ball characters, transformations, power stats, planets and locations

name: Met Museum Collection API
description: Access 470,000+ artworks with metadata and high-resolution images from The Metropolitan Museum of Art

name: OpenF1 API
description: Real-time and historical Formula 1 telemetry at 3.7 Hz: lap timings, car speeds, DRS, radio comms and team data
notes: Completely free. Historical data back to 2023

name: Sunset Sunrise API
description: Sunset and sunrise times for any latitude/longitude with civil, nautical and astronomical twilight data

name: ISS Location API
description: Current location of the International Space Station with latitude, longitude and timestamp in JSON/JSONP

name: Tarot Card Meanings API
description: Card names, descriptions and divinatory meanings for 78-card Rider-Waite-Smith tarot deck from AE Waite's guide

name: NPPES NPI Registry API
description: Real-time healthcare provider lookup by National Provider Identifier (NPI) from NPPES public database

name: wttr.in API
description: Console-oriented weather forecast service supporting ANSI sequences for terminals, HTML for browsers, PNG for graphical viewers

name: The Color API
description: Swiss army knife for colors — pass any color and get conversions, name, placeholder images and color scheme variants

name: Affirmations API
description: Random inspirational affirmations API providing positive messages to boost self-esteem and motivation

name: Global Flood API
description: Simulated river discharge at 5km resolution from 1984 with up to 7 months forecast for flood risk monitoring

name: NDBC Buoy Data API
description: Real-time ocean buoy readings from NOAA National Data Buoy Center for ocean and weather monitoring research

name: Aare.guru API
description: Swiss Aare river public API including water temperature, flow rate, weather forecasts and swimming safety info

name: UV Index API
description: Real-time UV Index and 5-day hourly UV Index forecast globally using latitude/longitude. No API key needed

name: Global Shark Attack File API
description: Dataset of human-shark interactions with incident reports, bite patterns, species identification and circumstances

name: Extinct Animals API
description: Information about animals that became extinct in the last 11,650 years (Holocene extinction) sourced from Wikipedia

name: Naruto DB API
description: Database of Naruto anime/manga characters, clans, villages with traits, jutsus, affiliations and detailed stats

name: Demon Slayer API
description: Structured data from Demon Slayer anime including character details, combat styles, breathing techniques and quotes

name: Attack on Titan API
description: RESTful API with Attack on Titan data: characters, episodes, locations, organizations, titans and ODM gear

name: One Piece API
description: One Piece manga/anime data including sagas, devil fruits, chapters, volumes, episodes, characters and pirate crews

name: Fake Store API
description: Fake ecommerce REST API for testing and prototyping with product listings, cart management and user data
notes: Completely free. Perfect for UI mockups

name: Exchange Rate API (no-key)
description: Free currency conversion and exchange rate API requiring no API key. Supports current and historical exchange rates
notes: Free tier: no key needed, daily updates

name: Air Quality Index WAQI API
description: Real-time air quality data API with AQI and pollutant concentrations (PM2.5, PM10, CO, NO2, O3) for 1000+ cities

name: Stripe API
description: Complete payment processing platform for subscriptions, invoicing, billing, Connect and marketplace payments
notes: OpenAPI spec available via APIs.guru. ID: stripe.com

name: OpenAI API
description: AI models including GPT-4, DALL-E, Whisper and embeddings for text generation, image creation and speech recognition
notes: OpenAPI spec available via APIs.guru. ID: openai.com

name: Zoom API
description: Create and manage Zoom meetings, webinars, recordings, reports, users and real-time event data via REST API
notes: OpenAPI spec available via APIs.guru. ID: zoom.us

name: Azure Computer Vision API
description: AI-powered image analysis for object detection, OCR text extraction, face detection and image content moderation
notes: OpenAPI spec available via APIs.guru. ID: microsoft.com:cognitiveservices-ComputerVision

name: Bing News Search API
description: Search for news articles with filtering by category, market, freshness, safe search and clustering options
notes: OpenAPI spec available via APIs.guru. ID: microsoft.com:cognitiveservices-NewsSearch

name: Bing Spell Check API
description: Context-aware spell checking and grammar correction using Bing's neural language model
notes: OpenAPI spec available via APIs.guru. ID: microsoft.com:cognitiveservices-SpellCheck

name: Zapier NLA API
description: Natural Language Actions API exposing 5000+ Zapier integrations to AI assistants and LLM applications
notes: OpenAPI spec available via APIs.guru. ID: zapier.com:nla

name: Twilio Verify API
description: Two-factor authentication and phone verification via SMS, voice, email, TOTP and push notifications globally
notes: OpenAPI spec available via APIs.guru. ID: twilio.com:twilio_verify_v2

name: Twilio Video API
description: Real-time video communication platform for building video chat rooms with tracks, participants and recording
notes: OpenAPI spec available via APIs.guru. ID: twilio.com:twilio_video_v1

name: DeepL Translation API
description: High-quality neural machine translation supporting 29 languages with context-aware accuracy surpassing Google Translate

name: AssemblyAI API
description: AI speech recognition with transcription, speaker diarization, summarization, sentiment analysis and LeMUR AI assistant

name: Hugging Face Inference API
description: Run 200,000+ ML models from HuggingFace Hub for NLP, image generation, audio, translation and multimodal tasks
notes: Free tier for small models. Serverless inference

name: Replicate API
description: Run AI models in the cloud: Stable Diffusion, Llama, Whisper, custom ML models via simple HTTP API

name: Stability AI API
description: Stable Diffusion image generation API for text-to-image, image-to-image, inpainting, upscaling and video generation

name: ElevenLabs API
description: Ultra-realistic AI text-to-speech with voice cloning, emotional control and multilingual dubbing in 29 languages

name: Anthropic Claude API
description: Anthropic's AI assistant API for text generation, analysis, long-context reasoning, coding and structured outputs

name: Pinecone API
description: Fully managed vector database for storing and querying high-dimensional embeddings enabling semantic search and RAG

name: Have I Been Pwned API
description: Check if email addresses or passwords appear in data breaches from Troy Hunt's HIBP database of 14+ billion accounts
notes: Pwned Passwords free. Email check requires $3.50/month API key

name: Plaid API
description: Connect to 11,000+ banks to retrieve accounts, transactions, balances, identity and income verification data
notes: Free sandbox. Production pricing per API call

name: SEC EDGAR Full-Text API
description: Official SEC API for accessing US public company filings, 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K forms and financial statements

name: Cloudinary API
description: Image and video management API for upload, transformation, optimization, effects and CDN delivery at scale

name: RAWG Video Games Database API
description: Largest video game database with 500,000+ games, screenshots, Metacritic scores, platforms and user ratings

name: SteamSpy API
description: Steam game statistics: player counts, ownership estimates, genres, tags, reviews and historical game metadata

name: Yelp Fusion API
description: Search and discover local businesses by location, category, hours, price range and ratings with reviews and photos

name: Clearbit Enrichment API
description: Business intelligence API for company and person data enrichment, email lookup and B2B lead scoring

name: Brandfetch API
description: Automatically fetch company logos, brand colors, fonts, domains and brand guidelines from any company name or domain

name: Vercel API
description: Deploy and manage frontend applications, serverless functions, domains and edge network config via Vercel REST API
notes: Free hobby plan. Deploy from Git

name: Sentry API
description: Error tracking and performance monitoring API for managing projects, issues, releases and source map deployments

name: DataDog API
description: Monitoring and observability API for metrics, traces, logs, events, dashboards, monitors and infrastructure data

name: New Relic NRQL API
description: Application performance monitoring and observability platform with distributed tracing, APM and infrastructure metrics

name: PagerDuty API
description: Incident management API for managing services, escalation policies, alerts, on-call schedules and event routing
notes: Free: 5 users. Paid for enterprise features

name: Brave Search API
description: Independent web, news and image search API from Brave Browser without Google tracking or SEO manipulation

name: SerpAPI
description: Scrape SERP results from Google, Bing, Yahoo, DuckDuckGo, Baidu and more in structured JSON format

name: Supabase API
description: Open-source Firebase alternative REST API for Postgres, auth, file storage, realtime subscriptions and edge functions

name: Firebase Realtime Database API
description: NoSQL cloud database REST API for real-time data synchronization across web and mobile clients

name: Upstash Redis API
description: Serverless Redis REST API with per-request pricing for caching, rate limiting, queuing and pub/sub messaging

name: Liveblocks API
description: Real-time collaboration REST API for multiplayer cursors, presence tracking, collaborative editing and comments

name: Contentful CDA API
description: Headless CMS Content Delivery API for fetching content, entries and assets from Contentful spaces for web/mobile

name: Auth0 Management API
description: Identity platform API for managing users, roles, permissions, connections, applications and authentication flows

name: Okta API
description: Enterprise identity and access management API for user auth, SSO, MFA, SCIM provisioning and lifecycle management

name: Daily Video API
description: WebRTC video call API for embedding real-time video, audio, screen sharing and recording into web and mobile apps

name: Vonage SMS API
description: Send and receive global SMS, MMS and WhatsApp messages. Verify phone numbers and make voice calls worldwide

name: Bandwidth Communications API
description: Enterprise-grade voice, SMS, MMS and emergency services (E911) API for US and Canada markets

name: Mailgun Email API
description: Transactional email API with SMTP relay, template engine, tracking, bounce handling and email validation

name: Postmark Email API
description: Transactional email delivery focused on speed and reliability with templates, tracking and spam score checking

name: Mixpanel Analytics API
description: Product analytics API for tracking user events, funnels, retention cohorts, A/B test results and user segmentation

name: Shopify Admin REST API
description: Manage Shopify store products, orders, customers, inventory, variants, fulfillments and storefront settings
notes: Requires Shopify store. Partner account is free

name: PDFco API
description: PDF processing REST API for creation, conversion, merging, splitting, OCR, watermarking and data extraction

name: DocuSign eSignature API
description: Electronic signature API for requesting, tracking and managing digital signatures on contracts and documents
notes: Free developer sandbox. Production requires plan

name: Linear API
description: Engineering project management GraphQL API for syncing issues, cycles, projects, teams and workflow automations
notes: GraphQL API. Free team plan available

name: Zendesk Support API
description: Customer support platform API for managing helpdesk tickets, users, organizations, macros and SLA policies

name: Intercom API
description: Customer messaging API for contacts, conversations, messages, events, tags and company data management

name: Diffbot API
description: AI web scraping and knowledge graph API that automatically extracts structured data from any web page or URL

name: Proxycurl API
description: LinkedIn data enrichment API for professional profiles, company pages, job listings and people search without LinkedIn

name: Lottie Files API
description: Vector animation library API for searching, accessing and managing Lottie JSON animations for web and mobile apps
